roleset_name: reflect, mimic, cast an image back

roles.descr: the original, entity whose image is recreated
roles.descr_trans: 其图像被重新创建的原始实体

roles.descr: the mirror image, the reflection, the copy (usually subject)
roles.descr_trans: 镜像、倒影、复制品（通常是主体）

roles.descr: axis/plane of symmetry (akin to the mirror's surface)
roles.descr_trans: 对称轴/对称面（类似于镜子的表面）
